§ Berachain

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

**Berachain** is a [[blockchain-network]] built using the [[cosmos-sdk]].

§§ Currency

**Berachain**'s native currency is called **BERA**.

§§ Consensus Algorithm

**Berachain** uses the [[proof-of-liquidity]] [[consensus-algorithm]].

§§ Validator Nodes

Before //version 2// of **berachain**, **berchain** had a limit of 100 **validator nodes**.
But, as of //version 2// of **berachain**, **berachain** now has a limit of 128 **validator nodes**.
